name: WikiTool
short_description:
What's New ?:

1- Improved Article Tools Dialogue
2- Removed Keyboard Shortcut, Was Replaced With A Text That Represents The Title Of The Article

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wikitool allows you to search for articles on the popular Wikipedia online encyclopedia website without using a web browser.

The application offers users the possibility of creating a Wikipedia account via the register button and speeds up the login process by enabling you to sign in from Wikitool main window.

Wikitool features an intuitive multilingual interface that comprises navigation options to make things even more easier. With the push of a button, the application can access Wikipedia articles randomly, so you might just stumble upon something that catches your interest.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Only For Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Window
summary: Stay documented, perform multiple searches and read articles
